description:
If fine dining trail mix was a thing, this is it. Perfectly roasted organic cashews, walnuts, and almonds, paired with nuggets of rich dark chocolate, raisins, and craisins… it is as good as it sounds.

  • Ingredients: 70% cocoa dark chocolate* (cocoa liquor*, cane sugar*, cocoa butter*, vanilla extract*), raisins* (raisins*, sunflower oil*), walnuts*, cranberries* (cranberries*, cane sugar*, sunflower oil*), cashews*, almonds*, sea salt. *Organic
  • Allergens: may contain: Brazil nuts, hazelnuts, pecans, pistachios, milk, sesame
  • Prana is Montreal based family business committed to making healthy and delicious snacks, with low impact. When possible, Prana Organics uses locally sourced organic ingredients. When they can’t find what they need nearby, Prana Organics ensure the farmers they work with use sustainable farming practices and have fair working environments
name: Prana Organic Kilimanjaro Mix
